alert.note: Alert for Mobile Central (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 3:12PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Mobile, northwestern Baldwin and southwestern Washington Counties through 400 PM CDT... At 311 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 4 miles southeast of Tibbie to 7 miles south of Leakesville to 7 miles northwest of Lucedale. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Saraland, Chickasaw, Satsuma, Citronelle, Creola, Chunchula, Stockton, Gulfcrest, Axis, Calvert, Mount Vernon, Semmes, Tanner Williams, I65 And I165, Mobile Regional Airport, Wilmer, I65 And AL 225, I65 And AL 158 and Movico. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for southwestern Alabama.
